##Graphics Packages

- lattice http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Descriptions/lattice.html
- rgl http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Descriptions/rgl.html
- tkrplot http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Descriptions/tkrplot.html
- iplots http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Descriptions/iplote.html
- rpanel provides a set of functions to build simple GUI controls for R functions. These are built on the tcltk package. Uses could include changing a parameter on a graph by animating it with a slider or a "doublebutton", up to more sophisticated control panels. http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Descriptions/rpanel.html
